enum: Alcohol intake exceeds recommended daily limit
Alcohol intake within recommended daily limit
AlcoholConsumptionMenu.title: AlcoholConsumptionMenu

age_at_comorbidity_diagnosis.description: Indicate the age (in days) of comorbidity diagnosis.

comorbidity_code.description: Use ICD-10 code or Mondo code to indicate the comorbidity diagnosed.

comorbidity_status.description: Indicate the current state or activity of the comorbid condition.

comorbidity_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the comorbidity_code

comorbidity_treatment_status.description: Indicate whether the comorbid condition is currently being treated or not.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

Demographic.description: Data for the characterization of the participant by means of segmenting the population (e.g., characterization by age, sex, or race).

ethnicity.description: Refers to the ethnic or cultural origins of a person’s ancestors. The provided values are based on the list of ethnic or cultural origins 2021 defined by Statistics Canada

gender.description: Refers to an individual's personal and social identity as a man, woman or non-binary person (a person who is not exclusively a man or a woman). The provided values are based on the categories defined by Statistics Canada

race.description: A social construct used to judge and categorize people based on perceived differences in physical appearance in ways that create and maintain power differentials within social hierarchies. There is no scientifically supported biological basis for discrete racial groups. The provided values are based on race-based data standard defined by CIHI guidance

sex_at_birth.description: Refers to sex assigned at birth. Sex at birth is typically assigned based on a person's reproductive system and other physical characteristics. The provided values are based on the categoried defined by Statistics Canada

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

Demographic.title: Demographic

Diagnosis.description: The disease that is inferred to be present in the individual, family or cohort being analyzed.

age_at_diagnosis.description: Age of participant (in days) at time of diagnosis of the condition.

disease_category.description: A broader classification that groups diseases into categories.

disease_code.description: Use ICD-10 code or Mondo code to represent the disease diagnosed.

disease_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the disease_code

submitter_diagnosis_id.description: Unique identifier of the primary diagnosis event, assigned by the data provider.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

Diagnosis.title: Diagnosis

alcohol_consumption.description: Indicate current alcohol consumtion based on recommended daily limit.

physical_activity.description: Indicate how many times per week the participant exercises for at least 30 minutes.

smoking_status.description: Indicate smoking status and history of a participant at the time of the data collection.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

FollowUp.description: Any point of contact with a patient after primary diagnosis.

age_at_followup.description: Participant's age (in days) at time of the follow up event

disease_status_at_followup.description: Indicate the participant's disease status at time of follow-up

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

FollowUp.title: FollowUp

Measurement.description: Record individual measurements to capture quantitative, ordinal (e.g., absent/present), or categorical measurements.

age_at_measurement.description: Age (in days) of the participant at the time the lab test or measurement was conducted.

measurement_code.description: Use standartized LOINC (Logical Observation Identifiers Names and Codes) code to represent quantitative, ordinal, or categorical measurements.

measurement_result_categorical.description: The categorical result of the lab test or measurement.

measurement_result_numeric.description: The numeric result of the lab test or measurement.

measurement_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the measurement_code

measurement_unit.description: Indicate the unit of measurement for the result using LOINC code.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

Measurement.title: Measurement

Medication.description: An agent such as a drug (pharmaceutical agent), broadly defined as prescription and over-the-counter medicines, vaccines, and large-molecule biologic therapies.

actual_cumulative_drug_dose.description: Indicate the total actual cumulative drug dose in the same units specified in drug_dose_units.

drug_code.description: Provide the standardized code from RxNorm, KEGG,  PubChem or NCIt to represent the drug.

drug_dose_units.description: Indicate units used to record drug dose.

drug_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the drug_code

prescribed_cumulative_drug_dose.description: Indicate the total prescribed cumulative drug dose in the same units specified in drug_dose_units.

submitter_treatment_id.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

Medication.title: Medication

Participant.description: The collection of all data related to a specific individual human in the context of a specific study.

age_at_death.description: Age of participant (in days) at time of death

age_at_enrollment.description: Age (in days) of participant at time of enrollment into the study

cause_of_death.description: Indicate the cause of a participant's death.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

vital_status.description: Participant's last known state of living or deceased.

Participant.title: Participant

Phenotype.description: Individual phenotypic features, observed as either present or absent (excluded), with possible onset, modifiers and frequency

age_at_phenotype.description: Participant's age (in days) when phenotype was observed

phenotype_code.description: Use standardized HPO (Human Phenotype Ontology) codes to represent the phenotype.

phenotype_duration.description: Indicate the length of time (in days) over which the phenotype was observed in the participant.

phenotype_observed.description: Indicate whether the phenotype was observed in the participant.

phenotype_severity.description: The degree or severity of the observed phenotype.

phenotype_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the phenotype_code.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

Phenotype.title: Phenotype

enum: Most days but not every day
PhysicalActivityMenu.title: PhysicalActivityMenu

Procedure.description: A clinical procedure performed on a subject. For example a surgical or diagnostic procedure such as a biopsy.

procedure_body_site_code.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code to describe the site of the surgery if applicable. Please use C80.9 if the site is Unkown.

procedure_body_site_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the procedure_body_site_code

procedure_code.description: Use code from NCIt, SNOMED-CT, UMLS or CCI to represent the procedure performed.

procedure_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the procedure_code

submitter_treatment_id.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

Procedure.title: Procedure

anatomical_site_irradiated_code.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code to describe the irradiated site of radiation if applicable. Please use C80.9 if the site is Unkown.

anatomical_site_irradiated_term.description: Provide the standardized and human readable term derived from the coding system associated with the anatomical_site_irradiated_code

radiation_dosage.description: Indicate the total dose given in units of Gray (Gy).

radiation_fractions.description: Indicate the total number of fractions delivered as part of treatment.

radiation_modality.description: Indicate NCIt code to denote the modality of radiation therapy.

submitter_treatment_id.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

enum: Current reformed smoker, duration not specified
Lifelong non-smoker (<100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime)
SmokingStatusMenu.title: SmokingStatusMenu

Specimen.description: Any material sample taken from a biological entity, living or dead, from physical object or the environment

age_at_specimen_collection.description: Indicate participant's age( in days) when specimen was collected.

specimen_anatomic_location_code.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic location of a specimen when it was collected. Please use C80.9 if the primary site of a specimen is Unkown.

specimen_anatomic_location_label.description: Provide the human readable label for the specimen anatomic location code.

specimen_laterality.description: For cancer in a paired organ, indicate the side on which the specimen was obtained.

specimen_processing.description: Indicate the technique used to process specimen.

specimen_storage.description: Indicate the method of long term storage for specimen that were not extracted freshly or immediately cultured.

specimen_tissue_source_code.description: Indicate the tissue source of the specimen from which a biopsy or other tissue specimen was obtained.  Use codes from NCIt (NCI Thesaurus) or SNOMED-CT (SNOMED Clinical Terms) in Compact URI (CURIE) pattern.

specimen_tissue_source_term.description: Indicate the human readable label for the specimen tissue source code.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

submitter_specimen_id.description: Unique identifier of the specimen within the study, assigned by the data provider.

Specimen.title: Specimen

enum: Cryopreservation of live cells in liquid nitrogen
SpecimenProcessingMenu.title: SpecimenProcessingMenu

Treatment.description: Medications, procedures, other actions taken for clinical management

age_at_treatment.description: Age (in days) of the participant at the time the treatment was administered.

submitter_participant_id.description: Unique identifier of the participant within the study, assigned by the data provider.

submitter_treatment_id.description: Unique identifier of the treatment, assigned by the data provider.

treatment_duration.description: The length of time (in days) over which the treatment was administered.

treatment_intent.description: The purpose of the treatment or the desired effect or outcome resulting from the treatment.

treatment_response.description: The outcome of the treatment, indicating how the patient responded to the intervention

treatment_status.description: Indicate the donor's status of the prescribed treatment.

treatment_type.description: The category or method of treatment administered

Treatment.title: Treatment

enum: Treatment incomplete due to technical or organizational problems
Treatment stopped due to acute toxicity
Treatment stopped due to lack of efficacy (disease progression)
TreatmentStatusMenu.title: TreatmentStatusMenu
